title: An electric current spike linked to nanoscale plasticity
title_cn: 与纳米级可塑性有关的电流峰值
abstract: The increase in semiconductor conductivity that occurs when a hard indenter is pressed into its surface has been recognized for years, and nanoindentation experiments have provided numerous insights into the mechanical properties of materials. In particular, such experiments have revealed so called pop-in events, where the indenter suddenly enters deeper into the material without any additional force being applied; these mark the onset of the elastic–plastic transition. Here, we report the observation of a current spike—a sharp increase in electrical current followed by immediate decay to zero at the end of the elastic deformation—during the nanoscale deformation of gallium arsenide. Such a spike has not been seen in previous nanoindentation experiments on semiconductors, and our results, supported by ab initio calculations, suggest a common origin for the electrical and mechanical responses of nanodeformed gallium arsenide. This leads us to the conclusion that a phase transition is the fundamental cause of nanoscale plasticity in gallium arsenide, and the discovery calls for a revision of the current dislocation-based understanding of nanoscale plasticity.
abstract_cn: 多年来，人们已经认识到将硬压头压入其表面时半导体电导率的增加，而纳米压痕实验已为材料的机械性能提供了许多见识。特别是，此类实验揭示了所谓的弹出事件，其中压头突然进入更深的材料，而没有施加任何额外的力。这些标志着弹性塑性转变的开始。在这里，我们报告观察到电流尖峰的急剧增加，随后在砷化镓的纳米尺度变形期间，在弹性变形结束时立即衰减至零。在以前的半导体纳米压痕实验中还没有看到这样的峰值，并且我们的结果得到从头算的支持，表明了纳米变形砷化镓的电和机械响应的共同起源。这导致我们得出以下结论：相变是砷化镓中纳米级可塑性的根本原因，这一发现要求对基于位错的纳米级可塑性的理解进行修订。

title: Nanotubular metal–insulator–metal capacitor arrays for energy storage
title_cn: 用于储能的纳米管金属-绝缘体-金属电容器阵列
abstract: Nanostructured devices have the potential to serve as the basis for next-generation energy systems that make use of densely packed interfaces and thin films. One approach to making such devices is to build multilayer structures of large area inside the open volume of a nanostructured template. Here, we report the use of atomic layer deposition to fabricate arrays of metal–insulator–metal nanocapacitors in anodic aluminium oxide nanopores. These highly regular arrays have a capacitance per unit planar area of ∼10 µF cm−2 for 1-µm-thick anodic aluminium oxide and ∼100 µF cm−2 for 10-µm-thick anodic aluminium oxide, significantly exceeding previously reported values for metal–insulator–metal capacitors in porous templates. It should be possible to scale devices fabricated with this approach to make viable energy storage systems that provide both high energy density and high power density.
abstract_cn: 纳米结构的器件有潜力成为利用密集堆积的界面和薄膜的下一代能源系统的基础。 制造这种装置的一种方法是在纳米结构模板的开放空间内构建大面积的多层结构。 在这里，我们报告了使用原子层沉积来制造阳极氧化铝纳米孔中的金属绝缘体和金属纳米电容器阵列。 这些高度规则的阵列对1-＆＃181; m厚的阳极氧化铝和＆＆的单位平面面积的电容为＆＃8764; 10＆＃181; F cm ＆＃8722; 2 10-m＃阳极氧化铝的＃8764; 100＆＃181; F cm ＆＃8722; 2 ，大大超过了先前报道的金属绝缘子的值。 多孔模板中的金属电容器。 应该有可能对使用这种方法制造的设备进行规模调整，以制造出既具有高能量密度又具有高功率密度的可行的能量存储系统。

title: Tunnelling readout of hydrogen-bonding-based recognition
title_cn: 基于氢键识别的隧道读数
abstract: Hydrogen bonding has a ubiquitous role in electron transport and in molecular recognition, with DNA base pairing being the best-known example. Scanning tunnelling microscope images and measurements of the decay of tunnel current as a molecular junction is pulled apart by the scanning tunnelling microscope tip are sensitive to hydrogen-bonded interactions. Here, we show that these tunnel-decay signals can be used to measure the strength of hydrogen bonding in DNA base pairs. Junctions that are held together by three hydrogen bonds per base pair (for example, guanine–cytosine interactions) are stiffer than junctions held together by two hydrogen bonds per base pair (for example, adenine–thymine interactions). Similar, but less pronounced effects are observed on the approach of the tunnelling probe, implying that attractive forces that depend on hydrogen bonds also have a role in determining the rise of current. These effects provide new mechanisms for making sensors that transduce a molecular recognition event into an electronic signal.
abstract_cn: 氢键在电子传输和分子识别中无处不在，DNA碱基配对是最著名的例子。扫描隧道显微镜图像和分子通道被扫描隧道显微镜尖端拉开时隧道电流衰减的测量对氢键相互作用很敏感。在这里，我们表明这些隧道衰变信号可用于测量DNA碱基对中氢键的强度。每个碱基对通过三个氢键连接在一起的连接处（例如鸟嘌呤与胞嘧啶相互作用）比每个碱基对通过两个氢键连接在一起的连接处（例如腺嘌呤和胸腺嘧啶相互作用）更硬。在隧穿探针的方法上观察到类似但不太明显的影响，这意味着依赖于氢键的吸引力也具有决定电流上升的作用。这些效应为制造将分子识别事件转换为电子信号的传感器提供了新的机制。</ p>

title: A molecular force probe
abstract: Force probes allow reaction rates to be measured as a function of the restoring force in a molecule that has been stretched or compressed. Unlike strain energy, approaches based on restoring force allow quantitative molecular understanding of phenomena as diverse as translation of microscopic objects by reacting molecules, crack propagation and mechanosensing. Conceptually, localized reactions offer the best opportunity to gain fundamental insights into how rates vary with restoring forces, but such reactions are particularly difficult to study systematically using microscopic force probes. Here, we show how a molecular force probe, stiff stilbene, simplifies force spectroscopy of localized reactions. We illustrate the capabilities of our approach by validating the central postulate of chemomechanical kinetics—force lowers the activation barrier proportionally to the difference in a single internuclear distance between the ground and transition states projected on the force vector—on a paradigmatic unimolecular reaction: concerted dissociation of the C–C bond.
abstract_cn: 力探针允许根据已拉伸或压缩的分子中的回复力来测量反应速率。与应变能不同，基于恢复力的方法允许对分子现象进行定量的分子理解，例如通过使分子发生反应，裂纹扩展和机械传感来转变微观物体。从概念上讲，局部反应提供了最佳机会，可洞悉速率随恢复力如何变化的基本见解，但使用微观力探头系统地研究此类反应尤为困难。在这里，我们展示了分子力探针刚性二苯乙烯如何简化局部反应的力谱。我们通过验证化学力学动力学的中心假设来说明我们的方法的能力，力与在范式单分子上预测的力矢量上预测的基态和过渡态之间的单个核间距之间的差异成比例地降低了激活势垒反应：C＆＃8211; C键的协同解离。

title: Three-dimensional imaging of short-range chemical forces with picometre resolution
title_cn: 具有皮米分辨率的短程化学力的三维成像
abstract: Chemical forces on surfaces have a central role in numerous scientific and technological fields, including catalysis, thin film growth and tribology. Many applications require knowledge of the strength of these forces as a function of position in three dimensions, but until now such information has only been available from theory. Here, we demonstrate an approach based on atomic force microscopy that can obtain this data, and we use this approach to image the three-dimensional surface force field of graphite. We show force maps with picometre and piconewton resolution that allow a detailed characterization of the interaction between the surface and the tip of the microscope in three dimensions. In these maps, the positions of all atoms are identified, and differences between atoms at inequivalent sites are quantified. The results suggest that the excellent lubrication properties of graphite may be due to a significant localization of the lateral forces.
abstract_cn: 表面上的化学力在许多科学和技术领域中起着核心作用，包括催化，薄膜生长和摩擦学。 许多应用都需要了解这些力的强度随位置在三个维度上的变化情况，但是直到现在，此类信息只能从理论上获得。 在这里，我们演示了一种基于原子力显微镜的方法，该方法可以获取此数据，并使用该方法对石墨的三维表面力场进行成像。 我们显示了具有皮米和皮欧顿分辨率的力图，可以在三个维度上详细描述表面和显微镜尖端之间的相互作用。 在这些图中，确定了所有原子的位置，并量化了不等价位点处原子之间的差异。 结果表明，石墨的优异润滑性能可能归因于侧向力的明显局部化。

title: Dopant profiling and surface analysis of silicon nanowires using capacitance–voltage measurements
title_cn: 使用电容电压测量对硅纳米线进行掺杂剂分布和表面分析
abstract: Silicon nanowires are expected to have applications in transistors, sensors, resonators, solar cells and thermoelectric systems. Understanding the surface properties and dopant distribution will be critical for the fabrication of high-performance devices based on nanowires. At present, determination of the dopant concentration depends on a combination of experimental measurements of the mobility and threshold voltage in a nanowire field-effect transistor, a calculated value for the capacitance, and two assumptions—that the dopant distribution is uniform and that the surface (interface) charge density is known. These assumptions can be tested in planar devices with the capacitance–voltage technique. This technique has also been used to determine the mobility of nanowires, but it has not been used to measure surface properties and dopant distributions, despite their influence on the electronic properties of nanowires. Here, we measure the surface (interface) state density and the radial dopant profile of individual silicon nanowire field-effect transistors with the capacitance–voltage technique.
abstract_cn: 硅纳米线有望在晶体管，传感器，谐振器，太阳能电池和热电系统中得到应用。了解表面特性和掺杂剂分布对于制造基于纳米线的高性能器件至关重要。目前，确定掺杂剂浓度取决于纳米线场效应晶体管中迁移率和阈值电压的实验测量值，电容的计算值以及两个假设：掺杂剂分布均匀且表面（界面）电荷密度是已知的。可以使用电容电压技术在平面设备中测试这些假设。该技术也已用于确定纳米线的迁移率，但是，尽管它们对纳米线的电子性能有影响，但尚未用于测量表面性质和掺杂剂分布。在这里，我们使用电容电压技术测量各个硅纳米线场效应晶体管的表面（界面）状态密度和径向掺杂分布。</ p>

title: Direct measurement of dopant distribution in an individual vapour–liquid–solid nanowire
title_cn: 直接测量单个蒸气-液体-固体纳米线上的掺杂剂分布
abstract: Semiconductor nanowires show promise for many device applications, but controlled doping with electronic and magnetic impurities remains an important challenge. Limitations on dopant incorporation have been identified in nanocrystals, raising concerns about the prospects for doping nanostructures. Progress has been hindered by the lack of a method to quantify the dopant distribution in single nanostructures. Recently, we showed that atom probe tomography can be used to determine the composition of isolated nanowires. Here, we report the first direct measurements of dopant concentrations in arbitrary regions of individual nanowires. We find that differences in precursor decomposition rates between the liquid catalyst and solid nanowire surface give rise to a heavily doped shell surrounding an underdoped core. We also present a thermodynamic model that relates liquid and solid compositions to dopant fluxes.
abstract_cn: 半导体纳米线在许多器件应用中显示出希望，但是用电子和磁性杂质进行受控掺杂仍然是一个重要的挑战。 已经在纳米晶体中确定了掺杂剂掺入的限制，引起了对掺杂纳米结构前景的担忧。 由于缺乏量化单个纳米结构中掺杂剂分布的方法而阻碍了进展。 最近，我们证明了原子探针层析成像可用于确定分离的纳米线的组成。 在这里，我们报告了单个纳米线任意区域中掺杂物浓度的首次直接测量。 我们发现，液体催化剂和固体纳米线表面之间的前驱物分解速率的差异会导致重掺杂壳围绕着低掺杂核。 我们还提出了一种热力学模型，该模型将液体和固体成分与掺杂剂通量联系起来。

title: Phonon populations and electrical power dissipation in carbon nanotube transistors
title_cn: 碳纳米管晶体管中的声子数量和电耗散
abstract: Carbon nanotubes and graphene are candidate materials for nanoscale electronic devices. Both materials show weak acoustic phonon scattering and long mean free paths for low-energy charge carriers. However, high-energy carriers couple strongly to optical phonons, which leads to current saturation and the generation of hot phonons. A non-equilibrium phonon distribution has been invoked to explain the negative differential conductance observed in suspended metallic nanotubes, while Raman studies have shown the electrical generation of hot G-phonons in metallic nanotubes. Here, we present a complete picture of the phonon distribution in a functioning nanotube transistor including the G and the radial breathing modes, the Raman-inactive zone boundary K mode and the intermediate-frequency mode populated by anharmonic decay. The effective temperatures of the high- and intermediate-frequency phonons are considerably higher than those of acoustic phonons, indicating a phonon-decay bottleneck. Most importantly, inclusion of scattering by substrate polar phonons is needed to fully account for the observed electronic transport behaviour.
abstract_cn: 碳纳米管和石墨烯是用于纳米级电子设备的候选材料。两种材料都显示出弱的声子散射和低能量载流子的平均自由程长。但是，高能载流子会与光子牢固耦合，从而导致电流饱和并产生热声子。非平衡声子分布已被用来解释在悬浮的金属纳米管中观察到的负微分电导，而拉曼研究表明金属纳米管中会产生热G声子。在这里，我们提供了功能正常的纳米管晶体管中的声子分布的完整图片，包括G模式和径向呼吸模式，拉曼非活性区边界K模式以及由非谐衰减构成的中频模式。高和中频声子的有效温度比声子的有效温度高得多，这表明声子衰减的瓶颈。最重要的是，需要包含基质极性声子的散射，以充分说明所观察到的电子传输行为。</ p>

title: A DNA nanomachine that maps spatial and temporal pH changes inside living cells
title_cn: 可以绘制活细胞内部时空pH变化图的DNA纳米机器
abstract: DNA nanomachines are synthetic assemblies that switch between defined molecular conformations upon stimulation by external triggers. Previously, the performance of DNA devices has been limited to in vitro applications. Here we report the construction of a DNA nanomachine called the I-switch, which is triggered by protons and functions as a pH sensor based on fluorescence resonance energy transfer (FRET) inside living cells. It is an efficient reporter of pH from pH 5.5 to 6.8, with a high dynamic range between pH 5.8 and 7. To demonstrate its ability to function inside living cells we use the I-switch to map spatial and temporal pH changes associated with endosome maturation. The performance of our DNA nanodevices inside living systems illustrates the potential of DNA scaffolds responsive to more complex triggers in sensing, diagnostics and targeted therapies in living systems.
abstract_cn: DNA纳米机器是合成组件，可在外部触发因素刺激下在定义的分子构象之间切换。 以前，DNA装置的性能仅限于体外应用。 在这里，我们报告了一个称为I开关的DNA纳米机器的构造，该机器由质子触发，并基于活细胞内部的荧光共振能量转移（FRET）充当pH传感器。 它是pH值从5.5到6.8的有效报告基因，pH值介于5.8和7之间，具有很高的动态范围。为证明其在活细胞中起作用的能力，我们使用I开关来绘制与内体成熟相关的时空pH变化 。 我们的DNA纳米装置在生物体内的性能说明了DNA支架对生物系统中传感，诊断和靶向疗法中更复杂的触发因素作出反应的潜力。</ p>
